divs: sighting detailsi was walking from my car to my apartment when i looked up and saw 3 small spheres pinkish in color seeming to hover in 12 o'clock position directly above me. then seemed to hang there for a bit. i ran inside to get my video camera and had trouble seeing them in the lcd viewfinder (very bright\very few clouds). when i would look up with my sunglasses on, i could see them they began to move due east into the horizon until i couldn't see them again. they were in the following formation. .2 .1 .3 they seemed to resemble the one object i filmed the previous saturday.
Summary: There were 3 of them I could see, pinkish hue small spheres.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There was one other sighting in Houston on or around February 9th 2008
